properties.address: 1 WESTFIELD ROAD, BISHOP AUCKLAND, COUNTY DURHAM DL14 6AE
properties.description: A large, warm lounge, with plenty of seating and tables. Free hot drinks. Freshly cooked lunches and puddings, for a small donation. But, no one is left hungry, as the Church will pay, for anyone who can't. We get fresh food, and cans / packets in from supermarkets, so people can take food home as well. A washing machine is available. Everyone is welcome
properties.title: Bishop Auckland Baptist Church

properties.address: Bishop Auckland Baptist Church, County Durham DL14 6AE
properties.description: Free to enter warm space including tea / coffee. Lunch available for a minimal donation or free Warm and friendly welcome to all
properties.title: Bishop Auckland Baptist Community Hub

properties.address: Westfield Road, Bishop Auckland, Co Durham DL14 6AE
properties.description: we cater for all ,also open Sunday Mornings for church kettle is always on we are evolving to meet need ,There is now a washing machine available we are evolving to be an open house now and will respond as need arises
properties.title: Communityhub@BishopAucklandBaptist Church

properties.address: St. Annes Church, Bishop Auckland, County Durham DL14 7NP
properties.description: A lovely warm welcome awaits anyone who comes through our doors. Fancy a brew, come take a pew! We have free hot drinks on offer and home made cakes and biscuits available. Donations are very welcome no matter how big or small however it's your company that we look forward to the most. So pop in and say hello.
properties.title: Connections at St Anne's Church

properties.address: Coxhoe Village Hall, DURHAM, Co Durham DH6 4DB
properties.title: Coxhoe and Area Community Pantry and Foodbank

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 6th November 2023** The Chapter House is open to provide warmth to those who may need it. Located just off the cathedral Cloisters, the Chapter House is open to all, providing a warm space to sit and relax. Please note some dates are excluded due to being used for services and events.
properties.title: Durham Cathedral, Chapter House

properties.description: Warm space time as found on Stockton Council website
properties.title: Greens Lane Methodist Church

properties.address: Trinity Methodist Church, Spennymoor, County Durham DL16 7NB
properties.description: The space is open to all. There is a Food Bank running at the same time.
properties.title: Tea and Toast, Trinity Methodist Church, Spennymoor, Co Durham

properties.description: A warm and friendly church space, with board games, free hot drinks and some warm snacks too.
properties.title: The House of Hope

properties.address: The Well, Bishop Auckland, County Durham DL14 9HJ
properties.description: We are a fully operating barista style cafe with a difference. We are volunteer led and operate a Trussell Trust Food bank and are always open to let people in to sit and watch the world go by, no purchase needed. We operate a suspended coffee scheme to provide coffee to those who are unable to afford to purchase their own.
properties.title: The Well

properties.address: Trimdon Grange Community Centre, Trimdon Station, County Durham TS29 6PB
properties.description: A lovely community building with 2 large rooms and a smaller room for quiet space
properties.title: Trimdon Grange Community-Centre

properties.description: Thursdays, 5.30pm til 7pm, tea, coffee, snacks, bingo, chat. Small donations only. All adults welcome. Warm, friendly, informal.
properties.title: Tudhoe Community Centre Cuppa Club

properties.address: St. Elizabeth of Hungary Church,, Newton Aycliffe, Durham DL5 4UE
properties.description: Open to all, a warm space to chat, do some crafting, play a game or share a quiz. Free though donations are welcome; tea, coffee and cakes served each week.
properties.title: Weekly Wednesday

properties.address: St. Clare's Church Hall, Newton Aycliffe, Durham DL5 5NT
properties.description: A warm space to meet friends and make friends; breakfast is on offer from 10am and at 12 a hot two course lunch is served. Everything is free but donations are welcome. A place of welcome and conversation, to chat or just having someone to listen.
properties.title: Welcome Cafe

properties.address: Stillington Village Hall Lowson Street Stillington TS21 1JE
properties.description: Facilities: Accessible entrance, free Wi-Fi, hot and cold refreshments, charging facilities, reading materials, accessible toilets, activities, baby changing facilities, and free car parking.
properties.title: Stillington Village Hall
